name: Discord Status Page dark theme
description: A theme for Discord's status page that thinks about your precious eyes.
additional_info:
Version 2019/05/04:
- Cleansed all the white from a recent statuspage css update
- Dropdowns are now dark

Version 2020/04/25:
- Added support for the status.discord.com domain

Version 2020/08/27:
- Added support for the discordstatus.com domain
